1: <pb/><t>Tzyaln pax Dios 'ixtic: A jun tic in checab', an 'ayn 'och yet'oc, an in si'jnac 'eli, caw tzin tzalj yet'oc, 'oj wa'cn 'och Wespíritu 'a 'a, sec 'oj sb'oyaj eb' nacion̈ 'a stojlal.</t>
2: <t>May 'aj 'oj q'ue yaw, may mach 'oj 'ab'noc sjaj 'a yoltc caye.</t>
3: <t>'Ay wal eb' caw 'oltac, 'icha junc te 'aj tzpacchji, mto 'icha junc cantil wan stupi, 'ixta eb'. Palta a 'oj colwjoc 'a eb', ma'oj yixtc eb', wal yel 'oj yac' tojlal 'a eb'.</t>
4: <t>Ma'oj 'iljoc, ma'oj schab'c'ojloc sb'a, masnto 'oj b'eylb'axc tojlal chi 'a sat lum lum tic. A jun tzo'n̈ nacion̈ 'ay 'a sti a mar, 'oj smaclc eb' yab' cuynb'il 'oj yac'a', xchi Dios.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A Jehová Dios 'ix b'on satcha'an̈, xlajw cha, 'ix sjen̈n 'ati. A 'ix b'on lum lu'um, yet' smasnil tas tzpac' 'a sat lu'um, a tz'a'n qui q'uinl an̈ 'anman̈ec tic, tzya'n pax qui'c quic', tzyaln 'a jun schecb' chi 'ixtic:</t>
6: <t>An Jehová in an ach wawtej, sec tza b'o tojlal 'a sat lum lu'um. Caw tan̈b'ilch wu'uj. Ach 'oj ach in c'anlb'oc yic 'oj in b'onc in trato yet' eb' 'anma', ax ochcn sacq'uinlal 'a jun tzo'n̈ xo nacion̈.</t>
7: <t>Tzin nib'j tza jac sat eb' matz uj yilni, tza coln 'elt eb' 'aych 'a preso, atn eb' preso yaj 'a scal q'uic'q'uinal.</t>
8: <t>An tic Jehová in, atn in b'i tic. Ma'oj in cha alxoc wach' paxti 'a junc xo mach yuj tas in b'ojnac, ma'oj in cha 'ijxoc chan̈ jun tzo'n̈ yechl chi in jeloc.</t>
9: <t>'Iltec wal 'ix 'aj 'el'ch smasnil tas waljnac 'a yictax yaln̈taxi. Ax ticnec, 'ay jun tzo'n̈ xo tas mantzac wal 'ayex, a 'oj wala'. 'Aycto tzwaln cani, ya' sb'a mantzac uji, xchi Dios.</t>
10: <t>Ex 'anma cajn 'a snajtil 'el sti lum lu'um, ex tzex 'ec' 'a yib'n̈ a mar, yet' no noc' cajn ta', yet' pax ex cajn ex 'a jun tzo'n̈ chon̈b' 'ay 'a sti a mar cha, b'itnejec junc 'ac' b'it yic tzeyaln e wach' paxti 'a Jehová.</t>
11: <t>Tzalj cab' chan̈ eb' chon̈b' 'ay 'a lum cusltac lu'um, yet' eb' yin̈tl can win Cedar cajn 'a jun tzo'n̈ scamplamento. Eb' 'aj chon̈b' Sela, b'itn cab' eb' 'a tzaljc'ojlal, q'ue cab' yaw eb' sb'itn 'a lum jolmctac witz.</t>
12: <t>Yal cab' eb' chon̈b' 'ay 'a sti a mar swach' paxti 'a Jehová.</t>
13: <t>'Oj 'eltc Jehová yet' yowl sc'ojol, 'icha junc 'a'm owl tzq'ue yaw ya'n owal, ax yejm eb' 'ajc'ojl chi yu'uj.</t>
14: <pb/><t>A Jehová a tzaln 'ixtic: Caw najtl sictac in 'aji, may tas tzwala, in 'och wa'an; palta ax ticnec, 'oj 'el waw 'icha junc 'ix 'ix wan yalj yune', caw tzc'acwi, toxn̈ej tzsi'si'ni.</t>
15: <t>'Oj in satcn 'el eb' lum witz yet' eb' lum tzalan. 'Oj in satl smasnil te te', 'oj wa' tup chan̈ eb' a niwc a tzb'eyi, ax yochcn cusltac lumal. 'Oj wac' tupchan̈ eb' a niwc pama'.</t>
16: <t>A eb' matz uj yilni, 'oj wi't eb' 'a jun tzo'n̈ b'e to man̈ yojcoc. A q'uic'q'uinal, sacq'uinl 'oj wutc can 'a yojltac eb', ax wa'n pan̈ljoc eb' lum ch'olctac. Yowlal 'oj wac' 'el'choc jun tzo'n̈ tic 'a eb', ma'oj wactc can eb' schoc'oj.</t>
17: <t>A wal eb' 'anma tz'a'n 'och jun tzo'n̈ yechl yipc sc'ojol, tzyaln sb'a eb' 'a jun tzo'n̈ yechl chi 'ixtic: Ax tic, qui diosal ex, xchi eb' 'a eb'. A eb' tzaln chi 'ixta', caw q'uixwc'ojlal 'oj 'aj eb' s'atcni.</t>
18: <t>Ex chacan̈, 'ab'xnan̈ec, ex matz uj eyilni, 'iltec ticnec.</t>
19: <t>Toc 'ay mach jun 'eln̈ej caw matz uj yiln 'icha jun in checb' sic'b'il 'el wu'uj, toc 'ay junc mach to chacn̈ 'icha jun in checb' checb'il 'at wuj an Jehová in.</t>
20: <t>Ex israel, caw 'ay cob' tas tzch'oxx eyila', palta matz e chamc'ojlej eyilni; caw wach' eyab'ni, palta matz e chaj eyab'i'.</t>
21: <t>An Jehová in, caw tzin nib'j tzin colwji, yuj cha, xwa'n cuynb'il caw wach' 'ayex.</t>
22: <t>Yuj e tenmtaquil 'ix 'el'x 'at tas 'ay 'ayex, ex 'ijx 'at 'icha presoal e masnil, ex 'ajx 'ejm 'a yol lu'um. Caw ex lajw 'eli. Man̈x 'a mach ex coln 'eli. Ex 'el'x 'ati, man̈x 'a mach ex 'i'n 'ec' 'a eb' 'elc'm cha, xchi Dios.</t>
23: <pb/><t>¿Machx wal tze nib'j tze chaj eyab' jun tzo'n̈ tic ex wit chon̈ab'? ¿Machx wal tzchaj e c'ojl eyab'n tas 'oj ujoc?</t>
24: <t>¿Mach 'ix chan 'ajxc ganar eb' israel yin̈tl can Jacob yic 'ix 'el'x 'at smasnil tas 'ay 'a eb'? Atn Jehová, yujto 'ix 'och smul eb' 'a 'a. Ma'ix schaj sc'ojl eb' sb'eylb'ej sb'eyb'al, ma'ix syiclj pax eb' scuynb'il, atn jun tzo'n̈ 'ac'b'il can 'a eb' yu'uj.</t>
25: <t>Yuj wal cha, 'ix cot yowl Dios, xya'n 'och yailal 'a yib'n̈ eb', 'ix jaw wal jun niwquil owl 'a yib'n̈ eb', 'icha wal sn̈ilchj te c'ac', 'ixta 'ix 'aj sjawi; palta man̈ yujoc cha 'ix sna sb'a sc'ojl eb'.</t>
